message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10000.
I understand that $10000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $13000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really get a lot of value out of it.
